generated_body: The article about KFC selling Nashville Hot Chicken and Waffles is likely to provide details on this new menu item, which combines the popular spicy chicken with a sweet waffle, appealing to fans of both dishes. It may discuss the reasoning behind this combination, possibly highlighting its popularity in Southern cuisine and KFC's strategy to attract customers. Additionally, the article could include information on the availability of this limited-time offer, pricing, and any promotional events related to the launch. Overall, it aims to inform readers about an exciting new offering from a well-known fast-food chain.
